qas.question: What events did Bermuda compete in at the 2004 Summer Olympics?

answers.text: sailing, athletics, swimming, diving, triathlon and equestrian events
made history by becoming the first black female diver to compete in the Olympic Games.

Patrick Singleton đứng vị trí thứ 19, với thời gian cuối cùng là 1: 59.81. <b7_0> Jillian Teceira <b7_0/> thi đấu tại Olympic Bắc Kinh năm 2008.
